typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Name as string,
		ActivityPlanName as string,
		PlannedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true) ~> ReadCreateSustainmentActions
ReadCreateSustainmentActions select(mapColumn(
		{$id} = Name,
		ActivityPlanName,
		PlannedDate),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> IdSelection
IdSelection derive({$metadata.$model} = 'dtmi:SustainmentAction;1',
	{$entityDelete} = 'false') ~> ModelDefinition
source(output(
		SustainmentAction as string,
		Index as string,
		Value as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true) ~> ReadMapBudgetCategories
ReadMapBudgetCategories aggregate(groupBy(SustainmentAction),
	BudgetCategories = toString(keyValues(collect(toString(Index)), collect(toString(Value))))) ~> AggregateMapBudgetCategoriesKeyIndex
AggregateMapBudgetCategoriesKeyIndex derive(BudgetCategories = replace(replace(replace(BudgetCategories, '"{', '{'), '}"', '}'), '\\', '')) ~> BudgetCategoriesCleaning
ModelDefinition, BudgetCategoriesCleaning join({$id} == SustainmentAction,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto') ~> BudgetCategoriesUnion
BudgetCategoriesUnion select(mapColumn(
		{$id},
		{ActivityPlanName},
		{PlannedDate},
		{$metadata.$model},
		{$entityDelete},
		BudgetCategories),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> BudgetCategoriesSelect
BudgetCategoriesSelect sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['tmp_SustainmentActions.v1.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteToTempRepo
source(output(
		Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true) ~> ReadTempStatusSustainmentActionsStatusEditor
ReadCreateSustainmentActions select(mapColumn(
		Name),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> StatusColumnSelectionSustainmentActionsStatusEditor
ReadTempStatusSustainmentActionsStatusEditor, StatusColumnSelectionSustainmentActionsStatusEditor union(byName: true)~> StatusUpdateSustainmentActionsStatusEditor
StatusUpdateSustainmentActionsStatusEditor sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['SustainmentActions_status.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteTempStatusStatusUpdateSustainmentActionsStatusEditor
